title: A question about &str and String, and their conversion
selftext:
Hello \~ Everyone\~

I am new to the rust programing language and I have a question when reading "The Book"

in this page : [https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch15-02-deref.html](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch15-02-deref.html)

in brief, the example source code is :

​

https://preview.redd.it/3i5eaxtitr371.png?width=627&format=png&auto=webp&s=f3d42c6a6362fc17c5bb09d4c777b775b6f35c2f

Why does the compiler automatically add "\[..\]"  ?  

Thanks in advance \~\~\~
